title: maramAnAn magan
sahitya:
maramAnAn magan magaikkAga puSpa vanamAnAn tandai namaik-kAkka


anupallavi

  guruvAnAn tandai tiru muni nAlvarukku guruvAnAn tanaiyInra tandaikku


caraNam    varam vENDuvOrellAm valam varuvAr ingE karam kuvittE pala gAnam isaippAr
pazham kETTa bAlakan pazhaniyil ANDiyE nam nalam tarum nAyakan ninradu pUNDiyE
